com.epimorphics.lda.sources

Class CombinedSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epimorphics.lda.sources.SourceBase
      • com.epimorphics.lda.sources.CombinedSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Source

    public class CombinedSource
extends SourceBase
implements Source
    A combined source is a way of composing data from different endpoints. The combination presents itself as a model which can be queried. The endpoints are specified by SPARQL queries themselves.
    Author:
    chris

        public CombinedSource(com.hp.hpl.jena.util.FileManager fm,
              AuthMap am,
              com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource ep)
        ep is a resource of type Combiner. It has multiple elements, each of which themselves represent sub-sources.
